title: Autoclasica
text:
Autoclasica is an elegance competition for <a href="classic%20car">classic</a> and <a href="vintage%20cars">vintage cars</a>. It has taken place every year since 1998 during the first weekend of October in <a href="San%20Isidro%2C%20Buenos%20Aires">San Isidro, Buenos Aires</a>, <a href="Argentina">Argentina</a>.
The event is the largest in South America, with more than 600 vehicles on display.
The show takes place the first week of October at the <a href="Hip%C3%B3dromo%20de%20San%20Isidro">Hipódromo de San Isidro</a> gardens, organized by the Club de Automoviles Clasicos (CAC), of Argentina.
